hits.definition:
调 (F 調)

[diào] shift, tone

[tiáo] adjust

曾

[céng] (= 曾经 céngjīng) in the past

[zēng] great- (grandmother)

[cēng] 挨曾儿 āicēngr 〈colloquial〉 to get a scolding

乐(F樂)

[lè] enjoy, be glad, pleasure, (= 快乐 kuàilè) happy

[yuè] (= 音乐 yīnyuè) music

切

[qiē] to cut

[qiè] correspond to; 一切 yíqiè all

克

[kè] (= 克服 kèfú) overcome, gram, (F 剋) 克期 kèqī set time limit

[kēi] (=剋) scold

哪

[nǎ] what? 哪儿 nǎr where?

[něi] (before classifier) which?

[na] (used in orders and exclamations)

[Né] (in foreign names)

冲

[chōng] (F 沖) rinse, rush, (F 衝) rush

[chòng] (F 衝) towards

乎

[hū] 似乎 sìhu it seems; 几乎 jīhū almost
